content: Imagine you are Tony Stark (Iron Man). In his style, write a text message apologizing for being late to a meeting.

Hey there, sorry I'm running a bit late for our meeting. You know how it is – gadgets and gizmos always need a bit of tweaking. But don't worry, I've got everything under control. Just hit some traffic with my suit on, but I'm on my way now. Should be there in a jiffy. Thanks for understanding!
